revised_title: Investigating the Changes in Glomeruli and Tubules of the Kidney during Activity
tldr: The authors investigate the changes in glomeruli and tubules of the kidney during activity, focusing on the role of intraglomerular blood pressure and the relationship between the capsule and the glomerulus. They find that the capsule expands and the glomerulus changes shape during active diuresis, suggesting a connection between the glomerulus and the propelling force of fluid down the tubule.
